'''''Interview With a Bygone God''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Treasure Lost, Treasure Found (Part 2)|Treasure Lost, Treasure Found]].''

==Trivia==
*The name of the achievement may be a reference to a 1994 American gothic horror film {{w|Interview with the Vampire (film) |Interview with the Vampire}} based on the novel of the same name.
